body_html:
I have the same problem (error: expected ')' before 'PRId64' etc.) with gcc 4.8.5 on Linux with the current head ( 02450ff)

What works for me is to add #define __STDC_FORMAT_MACROS at the beginning of the following four files:

  • torch/csrc/Storage.cpp
  • torch/csrc/Tensor.cpp
  • torch/csrc/cuda/Storage.cpp
  • torch/csrc/cuda/Tensor.cpp

(see also master...andreh7:2017-11-10-prid64-fix -- this can be turned into a pull request very easily)

This fix is the same as #3574 but for different files.

torch/csrc/Storage.cpp
torch/csrc/Tensor.cpp
torch/csrc/cuda/Storage.cpp
torch/csrc/cuda/Tensor.cpp

(see also master...andreh7:2017-11-10-prid64-fix -- this can be turned into a pull request very easily)

body:
I have the same problem (`error: expected ')' before 'PRId64'` etc.) with gcc 4.8.5 on Linux with the current head ( 02450fff3)

What works for me is to add `#define __STDC_FORMAT_MACROS` at the beginning of the following four files:
* torch/csrc/Storage.cpp
* torch/csrc/Tensor.cpp
* torch/csrc/cuda/Storage.cpp
* torch/csrc/cuda/Tensor.cpp

(see also https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/compare/master...andreh7:2017-11-10-prid64-fix -- this can be turned into a pull request very easily)

This fix is the same as #3574 but for different files.
